com.continuuity.weave.discovery
Interface DiscoveryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryDiscoveryService, ZKDiscoveryService
public interface DiscoveryService

DiscoveryService defines interface for registering Discoverable.

Method Summary
 Cancellable register(Discoverable discoverable)
          Registers a Discoverable service.
 

Method Detail

register

Cancellable register(Discoverable discoverable)
Registers a Discoverable service.

Parameters:
discoverable - Information of the service provider that could be discovered.
Returns:
A Cancellable for un-registration.
